REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Abandoned child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a quick witted, funny child. One day, HE wandered off on HIS wealthy genetic parents, and was ultimately lost in a supposedly unused ore warehouse. Due to cloning technology, HIS parents decided that the time looking for HIM was better spent on just cloning a better child.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Abductee
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was abducted by xenohumans when HE was still a baby. They experimented on HIM to understand HIS genetic structure. As HE grew up, NAME grew a little bit too big and strong for HIS captors and eventually escaped.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Academy student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME went to school like a good space cadet would. HECAP was very tall and was known for HIS good looks. Though HE worried more about HIS hairstyle than HIS grades, HE still somehow passed the final exams.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Adventuring child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was raised to become an engineer. For years, HE planned to stow away on a cargo ship and start a new, more adventuresome life. One night, after HIS parents fell asleep, HE managed to sneak on board a cargo ship just before it left port.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Amateur astronomer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was fascinated with astronomy. HECAP would spend hours gazing at planets and nebulae through HIS telescope. HECAP is credited with discovering a small comet that would, years later, strike a nearby moon and disrupt the mining operations there.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Amateur botanist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Spending many summers crawling through dirt, NAME found HE had quite the green thumb. Instead of learning to cook the food HE grew, HE just grew more and more.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Amateur engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up in a family with a military and engineering background. HECAP wanted to join the army but HIS father didn't like the idea, so HIS interest turned to great flying machines and works of engineering. HECAP secretly hoped that this would one day lead HIM to a life of galactic exploration.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Apocalypse child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME spent HIS childhood on a post-apocalyptic world. HECAP fought for survival from a young age, on a planet where trust did not exist. HECAP told everyone that HE had no luck.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Apprentice smith
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up helping in HIS father's smithy. They were some of the last smiths on the planet to use traditional smithing methods. They even collect some materials themselves. Sometimes, after work, NAME would practice using the swords HE forged.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Aristocrat
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into an aristocratic family, NAME spent HIS younger years in blissful ignorance. HISCAP studies were sporadic and HE never took a liking to anything involving HIS hands. Fate, however, would force a change in habit. A global war broke out and the nukes melted the planet's surface into radioactive glass.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Artful dodger
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up on one of the urbworlds and had to fend for HIMself all HIS life. HECAP never trusted anyone, relying on HIS persuasiveness and cunning to survive. HECAP soon became skilled with firearms and knives as well as words.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Artisan farmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up on a HIS family's glitterworld farm. They were one of the last farms on the planet that preferred traditional farming methods to glitterworld technology.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Aspergers rebel
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up as a rebel on an formerly-advanced rimworld devastated by war. HISCAP Aspergers syndrome meant HE struggled with social situations and was incapable of caring, but HE learned hard skills like research and shooting very quickly.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Aspiring engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME had a fascination with gadgets and gizmos. HECAP took apart and put together almost anything HE could find. HECAP got used to repairing toys brought to HIM by other children, and even fixed a few devices from HIS elders.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Aspiring pop idol
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was being trained in song and dance to become the next big pop idol. HECAP grew up being taken care of by company handlers. HECAP never knew manual labor, but learned a lot about music and social etiquette.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Athlete
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was professional athlete at early age. Thanks to HIS skills, HE was able to leave HIS homeworld and enroll in a glitterworld university of science and technology. Because of HIS demanding schedule and introverted nature, HE became socially inept.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Awkward nerd
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Always fascinated by machines, NAME spent HIS time studying robotics and holography. HECAP preferred the company of HIS scientific creations to that of other people.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Blackjack player
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The only useful skill NAME learned from HIS tough military school was card counting. HECAP amassed many enemies by cheating at casinos, becoming ever more edgy and violent as the threat of retaliation grew. When HE was finally caught, they burned half HIS skin off. He'll never be able to face fire or violence again.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Blessed child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born under auspicious circumstances to a midworld spiritual group and held in reverence throughout HIS childhood. HECAP learned to take care of the poor and give succor to the faithful from an early age.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bone collector
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born to a family of fortune hunters, NAME always had a passion for ancient history. Though never a tough or social child, HE loved to dig through history books as well as dirt piles.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bookworm
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME spent HIS youth in the library, reading every book HE could about the technical marvels of space travel, the engineering ingenuity of the space-faring pioneers, and the horrible yet fascinating tales of the mechanoid races. HECAP vowed that one day, HE would see these things for HIMself.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Brothel gofer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a steam-powered midworld wracked by a century of economic crises, NAME went to work at a young age. Scrounging, shoe-polishing, sewing - HE did it all. But HE was most known as a brothel gofer, delivering all manner of aphrodisiacs and chemicals to the girls' rooms.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Caravan child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born on a urbworld merchant ship to an entrepreneurial mother and an absent father.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Caravan traveler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born to a nomadic family of caravan traders on a rim world. HISCAP father, the caravan leader, taught HIM the caravan trade. Because HE was able to barter or hunt for all of HIS food, HE never had to worry about doing any farm work. Later, HIS father retired to a farm and offered NAME the position of caravan leader.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Caravan traveler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born to a family of traveling merchants, NAME was mentored by HIS father in the ways of being a trader. HECAP was often tasked with caring for the pack animals. Due to HIS nomadic lifestyle, HE hunted and bartered for HIS food.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Cat herder
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME helped out in HIS father's cat breeding business, socializing, herding, and feeding hundreds of cats. When HE refused to clean up after the cats, HE was transferred to the breeding science division.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child chemist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A midworld child, NAME was fixated on finding out exactly how everything worked. HECAP collected rare objects and performed dangerous experiments on them. Delving deeper into these experiments, HE became isolated from the rest of the world. HECAP only left HIS research area to collect more materials.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child of glass
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was raised underground on a "marble" planet - a wasteland of radioactive asphalt and toxic fallout. To survive on a planet devoid of life, HE had to learn how to farm underground and how to fight without wasting bullets.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child slave
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born to a poor family on a rimworld. HISCAP father sold HIM into slavery at a young age and HE was traded many times. A tycoon bought HIM as part of a child labor force and sent down into mines to look after machines and to work alongside them.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child-knave
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a child-knave of King Loteric. HECAP enjoyed the training with wooden sticks and engaging others in close combat. HECAP adapted quickly to the heat of battle and was good at spreading fire. HECAP served HIS lord well, until the king died in an unfortunate accident.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Child of a huntress
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: In the mountains of the planet Ticonderoga, NAME was raised by HIS tribal mother. She taught HIM survival skills - trapping, tracking, shooting, skinning, cooking and healing. HISCAP departed father had left behind an old bolt-action rifle, and NAME practiced with it every chance HE got.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Circus performer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up in the circus, NAME learned a lot of interesting things. More interesting then the balls HE juggled were the pockets HE picked between shows. A mistake with some firesticks made HIM develop a deathly fear of fire.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Class clown
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: In the ultra-competitive environs of HIS glitterworld school, NAME always offered to play the class clown to diffuse tension. HECAP developed a sense of social desperation from this, as well as an appreciation for the artistic side of comedy.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Coliseum cleaner
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: During the "Inner Destrian War" fallout, HIS parents were captured and HE was born into a life of slavery. Forced to clean coliseums after bloody battles for money. Watching, waiting, and learning. Coliseums were the only thing HE ever knew. One night while cleaning the coliseum, HIS family was murdered.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Colony kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born the child of two doctors in a small colony. Because of HIS parents, HE was always interested in science and medicine. NAME never really got along with other children, and as a result became withdrawn and unsociable.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Construction grunt
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up in HIS father's lab, NAME was given the life of an intellectual elite. HECAP got everything HE desired, and price was never an object. However, NAME did not partake in the luxury given to HIM. Instead, HE pursued more physical, and - in HIS father's eyes - lower-class jobs.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Core dilettante
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME spent HIS formative years on a glitterworld in the core region, where HE and HIS friends pursued lives of idle pleasure. As HE grew up, HE began to find the life of ease unfulfilling. HECAP decided to look for a more challenging path.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Core world student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME never fit in well with the other children, preferring creative pursuits, such as crafting jewelry, over sports.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Crime boss' child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was adopted child of a notorious crime boss. HECAP was taught all facets of the family business, from smuggling to inventive ways of killing. When the family was attacked, HIS father ordered HIM to hide in a secret longsleep crypt.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Diplomat's child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born in diplomatic family. Travelling often, HE was home-schooled and saw the world mostly through a computer.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Disaster survivor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was uprooted when marauders attacked HIS family farm, destroying machinery and killing farmhands and beasts alike. After the death of all HE knew, HE was left in the ruins to fend for HIMself.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Disciplined farmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was the younger of two children on the family farm, a frontier plot that struggled to turn a profit. NAME's father was a strict disciplinarian, constantly at NAME and HIS sibling to work harder and keep quiet. NAME burnt HIS hand making breakfast once and swore to cook only when HIS life was in danger.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Displaced noble
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on an urbworld to the ruler of three megacities, NAME's prospects looked good - until a violent insurrection overthrew HIS family. Exile introduced NAME to hard work and combat, but some high-born squeamishness remains.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Drudge
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was never sure what HE wanted to do with HIS life. HECAP spent most of HIS time doing low-wage jobs and wondering what HIS future would be like. HECAP entertained HIMself with space sims and survival games, dreaming of one day being somewhere more interesting.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Earth colonist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born on Earth. As a child, HECAP was launched into space as part of an interstellar colonization program.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Factory worker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up in a large factory city on an industrial world. Since poverty was rampant and food scarce, HE worked for whatever wages HE could get. This wasn't an easy life, but NAME never shied away from a hard day's work.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Farm child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME worked on HIS family's farm, looking after the animals and treating them when they were injured. Preferring hands-on tasks and the outdoors, HE avoided softer jobs that might have kept HIM cooped up inside. HECAP enjoyed this lonely work, and tended to stay out of people's way and do HIS own thing.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Farm kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up on HIS family's beef farm. HECAP enjoyed working the fields and taking care of the animals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Farm mechanic
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on a farming planet, NAME spent HIS time learning about the automated machinery that grew and harvested the multitude of crops.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Farmer child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's parents died in a fire when HE was seven. HECAP grew up on HIS uncle's farm, plowing fields and doing manual labor. HECAP could not bear answering questions about HIS parents, so HE replaced social contact with hard work.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Feral child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Abandoned on an animal planet as a small child with nought but a blanket with a name embroidered on it, NAME made HIMself one with the wilderness. When HE was 13, HE encountered a team of mineral surveyors, who "offered" HIM passage off of the planet.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Feudal farm kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was the child of a medieval farmer, and was expected to follow in his footsteps. HECAP was brought up as a kind, well trained farm kid. HECAP lived in an unusual feudal kingdom which co-existed with a midworld society which was itself well-known for genetic manipulation.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Fire-scarred child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was an active child who lived an uneventful childhood until HE fell into a fire and suffered horrific burns to HIS hands and arms. Although the scars have faded, HE can't bear to be in close proximity to fire.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Foundry apprentice
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up as an apprentice in the foundries of an industrial world. This experience gave HIM metalworking skills and strong muscles, but stunted HIS artistic development.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Frontier marshal
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME inherited a sense of duty from HIS father, and began a law enforcement career on HIS frontier homeworld. HECAP tried to uphold the law with honor, but the corruption and greed of local government officials often discouraged HIM.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Gang member
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up homeless on an urbworld. HECAP was forced to fight and struggle for everything, making HIM hard and ruthless long before adulthood. NAME would have stayed in those streets, had HE not been injured in a shootout and had HIS body confiscated for use by one of the worldwide city's ruling corporations.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Glitterworld kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The child of genetically-engineered "perfect mates" on a glitterworld, NAME was much more shy, withdrawn and nervous than HIS parents. HECAP kept mostly to HIMself, studying science and medicine and taking on gardening as a hobby. In HIS teens, HE ran away from home, seeking a quieter life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Gun kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up in a urbworld, NAME never had it easy. Every day was a struggle and pollution, hunger, and gangs of older kids. In the little space HE had to HIMself, HE studied HIS passion - guns, combat tactics, and war history.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hacker kid
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a high-tech world, NAME learned hack computers at a young age. Spending many hours tinkering alone made HIM very good with machines, but very bad with humans.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Headjack addict
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Plugged in to the computer via head-jack for days at a time, NAME found HE preferred the company of computers to that of people or pets.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hex-cell artist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME crafted sculptures from spent hex-cells and traded them to a local museum for food. After HIS popularity grew, HE was approached by a pirate and abducted. The pirate kept HIM prisoner and forced HIM to create sculptures for sale.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hillbilly prodigy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a cold hillbilly planet inhabited mainly by furred xenohumans, NAME grew up to the sound of bar fights and shootouts. Though HIS childhood was spent playing the banjo and working as a mechanic, HIS abnormal intelligence made HIM want something more; HE entered medical school at age twenty.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: History student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a child, NAME spent learned many artistic forms including music and novel writing. As HE grew older, HE began to study legends from HIS home world - legends of the lizard-like beings at the center of HIS culture's folklore.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hive world child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME had an isolated upbringing in an urbworld hive city. HISCAP hatred of heights kept HIM indoors often, and made HIM an introverted child. When HE did go out onto the catwalks of the city, HE enjoyed playing war games, becoming proficient with various simulation weapons.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Ice planet child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on the frozen wastes of an ocean moon, NAME only had animals and a few hard-bitten sailors as companions. The lack of social interaction made HIM develop a interest in engineering - but HE never developed any great fondness for humans.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Idealistic cadet
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised in the military traditions of HIS forefathers, NAME was taught from a young age that HE would be a great leader and the hero of HIS family. HECAP excelled at HIS studies and graduated from the academy with honors.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Imperial student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME studied on an imperial midworld where guns were banned and self-defense study was encouraged. The relative safety allowed HIM to focus on HIS botanical research.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Lab-grown child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born in a laboratory as part of a altruistic but failed attempt to create a new class of human. HISCAP childhood was filled with books and one-on-one tutoring. HECAP was awkward, shy, and naive to the true nature of humanity.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mad scientist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up miserable on the plains of a neolithic planet. HECAP found the strength to fight under the teachings of an old, broken scientist. HECAP quickly learned to play with people's fears, and was nicknamed "mad scientist."

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mechanoid hacker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The only child of a well respected mechanoid inventor, NAME had access to the materials to subvert and modify HISCAP father's creations. HECAP used drugs to increase HIS productivity. Unfortunately, the side-effects included persistent delusions of being mechanized, which limited HIS social life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mechanoid nerd
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up in an urbworld as the only child of a pair of mechanoid designers. They encouraged HIS interest in the machines. Eventually, HE became obsessed with building HIS own. Unfortunately this also lead to HIM being a loner as HE prefered technical books to friends.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medical student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up on a glitterworld in a family of doctors and chose to maintain the tradition. HECAP had few friends, but got along with HIS siblings very well.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medical student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into a long line of doctors, NAME was tutored in all fields of medicine, from herbal ointments to the modern synthetic drugs. HECAP also picked up a healthy disdain for lower class work.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval plower
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME lived on a planet where kings and queens ruled with little regard for the peasants beneath them. HISCAP family owned a large farm, but the king took most of the food it produced. This left NAME's family poor, and unable to pay for HIS education. Instead, HE was required to work the fields with HIS parents, and never had time to practice creativity.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval slave
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into slavery, NAME never knew HIS parents. HECAP eventually escaped from HIS masters and boarded a military cargo ship, where HE was pressed into military service.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval squire
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up on a medieval planet as a knight in training. HECAP trained directly under the king's war adviser for most of HIS youth, and learned to fight with a sword and shield.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval thief
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up poor and hungry on a medieval planet, learning to fend for HIMself. At first, HE only took what HE needed. Then HE learned to take what HE wanted.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary recruit
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Descended from a long line of off-world mercenaries, NAME grew up in a busy trading hub. HISCAP's interest in the foreign goods at the market often distracted HIM from HIS chores and training.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mercenary recruit
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born to a long line of off-world mercenaries, NAME grew up in a busy trading hub. At a young age, HE was recruited into one of the mercenary crews.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Midworld loner
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a sparsely-populated midworld, NAME had a few friends. HECAP preferred to pursue HIS passions in solitude, whether it be tinkering with HIS motorbike, watching lengthy vidcasts about the hottest new tech, or lining up HIS figurines and shooting them down with HIS pellet gun.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Military child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up in a family with a rich military background. HISCAP teenage years were spent traveling system to system wherever HIS parents were deployed. HECAP enlisted at age 18, following the tradition of HIS family.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Military trainee
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was raised on a military base in the Xennoa system. HECAP was exposed to many different strenuous activities and grew strong at an early age. HECAP also learned negotiation, medical, and military tactics.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Naturalist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up on a backwater planet with minimal education. HECAP had to hunt and grow food to survive. HISCAP family's home was frequently raided for food by scavengers. This made NAME very suspicious and slow to trust anyone HE doesn't know.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Noble ward
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was adopted by a prominent noble family after being left on their doorstep by HIS mother. HECAP quickly learned secrets that passed between the nobles like cheap wine - of worlds beyond HIS own, languages, cultures and technologies both new and old.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Optimistic child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was blessed with loving parents and a pleasant midworld life. HECAP was an optimistic and sociable kid who loved making friends and listening to their stories. HISCAP imagination would run wild with ideas and questions.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Orphan of war
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME lost HIS family and home early in life. HISCAP life became emotionally hollow, but HIS painful memories drove HIM to survive. HECAP took several jobs, but never achieved more than a basic education.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Orphan
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a deep space station, NAME was orphaned at a young age. In the orphanage, HE stood up for the weaker kids and fought off the bullies.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pampered
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a decadent glitterworld, NAME was given every expensive toy. This pampered lifestyle caused HIM to miss many basic life lessons. HECAP developed a special aversion to cooking, and always ordered the staff to do the kitchen work.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Pickpocket
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME witnessed HIS parents' murder at a young age. With no guidance, HE had to fend for HIMself any way possible. Joining a small group of misfits HE did whatever was necessary to survive.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Privileged prodigy
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was recognized as gifted early in HIS glitterworld upbringing. Luckily, HIS family was in a position to cultivate that genius through advanced education. HIS training included science, leadership, and the arts.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Psychology student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME researched new religions and traditions and often dreamt of distant stars. HISCAP dreams prompted HIM to ask what lay beyond the lights in the sky.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Punk
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME spent HIS childhood selling knockoff cigarettes to 15-year-olds. The cigarettes were often full of grass clippings.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Rebel slave
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born into corporate slavery and raised to perform menial tasks for minimum pay. HECAP was just another cog in the machine. NAME found HIS freedom by joining a rebel organization whose goal was to break free from their corporate masters.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Re-educated youth
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME lived on a midworld where the government cared about the youth. HECAP was one of the many children who were taken from their parents and forced into the new education programs.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Scavenger
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up in one of the few remaining cities on a world ravaged by nuclear war. HECAP learned to survive on HIS own in this post-apocalyptic wasteland by scavenging for technology and supplies.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Scout
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME loved being outdoors. HISCAP parents enrolled HIM in a program that taught military scouting skills. HECAP thrived when HE was left alone in the wilderness. Due to this upbringing, however, NAME did not learn the basic technological skills that are taken for granted by many others.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Sentimental child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a nice child. When anybody had a problem, HE tried to fix it. But, being a child, HE did not always succeed. This hurt HIS sensitive soul. HECAP dreamed of being a soldier who fights raiders and aliens.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Ship technician
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was an apprentice technician on trade ships plying their routes between the stations and planets of HIS home system. In this job, HE learned to fix and improve many machines. Sometimes, HIS ship was assigned to short exploratory jaunts into dangerous regions of space.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Shunned child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born into a small, poor family. HECAP was bullied relentlessly, beaten and hated. As HE grew up HE developed an interest in guns. HECAP usually studied from books, but occasionally managed to get some practice time with the real thing. NAME later discovered a talent for art and began to teach HIMself how to draw and paint.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Slave farmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Abandoned as a young child, NAME was found by a farmer. Being infertile himself, the farmer kept NAME as a slave. The constant beatings left HIM scarred and unable to handle violence. After many years, HE ran away.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space cadet
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on a rural farm-world leaves little opportunity for excitement and adventure, so when the Royal Fleet began a recruiting program on HIS home planet, NAME threw down HIS hoe and cattle prod to took up arms for the crown. HECAP served on the interplanetary super-destroyer HMS Thunder-Child.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Space fan
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME dreamed of space travel. HECAP built HIS own pretend spaceship from an old police box and went to see the great unknown.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Spoiled child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up the child of an industrious colony manager. In this position, most manual and dangerous tasks were forbidden by HIS parents, but on the rim everyone has to dirty their hands.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Squire
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born to a noble family on a medieval world, NAME became a squire. HISCAP training involved falconry, fencing, and wrestling - often done wearing armor. In battle, HIS job was to ensure that the knights were taken care of and their armor was well-polished.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Stablehand
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a stablehand on a medieval planet, mucking dung almost every day to earn HIS keep. By the time HE was exiting childhood, NAME had saved up enough money to pay a space trader to take HIM offworld.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Star squire
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a medieval word, NAME's first memory is of gazing up into the night's sky. Ever since, HE dreamed of squiring for a knight amidst the star-filled heavens. HISCAP focus on that vision left HIM somewhat single-minded.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Starforce cadet
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised on Amen-Ti, glitterworld capital of the Star Empire, NAME had an easy childhood. As a youth, NAME decided that joining the Starforce would be HIS way of giving back to the Empire.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Straggler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Despite being blessed with parental love, NAME hardly knew HIS parents. HECAP was frequently left to HIS own devices which meant more time devoted to exploring HIS interests... and getting into trouble.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Street child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME's drug addict mother died, leaving HIM an orphan at a young age. To stay alive, HE resorted to theft, and when necessary, prostitution. When NAME was caught stealing from a church, the priestess saw a wounded but smart child, and took HIM in to give HIM a second chance at life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Street urchin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born to a poor family on an urbworld, NAME was abandoned on the streets at a young age. HECAP learned to steal and kill to survive the ruthless streets, gaining skills in melee and ranged combat. There was little time for talk in HIS life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Student engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: A genius child, NAME was put in a special training program covering aerospace warfare and engineering. One day, HE tried to befriend a squirrel by giving it a bracelet. The squirrel bit HIM, earning HIM the nickname "Squirrel." NAME came to believe that work involving manual labor is beneath HIM.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Student socialite
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME learned politics in an elite training school for socially gifted students on Kalthas IV. While HE was naturally adept at reading and manipulating people, HE found no joy in it. HECAP left the academy several years before graduation.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Student
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME studied chemistry and quantum mechanics for entertainment. HECAP was very good at convincing others to do HIS physical work, and made it a goal in life to avoid manual labor.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tech scholar
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a youth scholar of the world of science and technology. HECAP strived every day to expand HIS intellectual abilities.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Test subject
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Test subject #11,529,914 of experiment #56,048 spent HIS childhood in white rooms performing mental and physical tests. HISCAP only companion was a voice that called itself Mother. Mother rewarded success with praise - and failure with harsh punishment.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tinkerer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up on a scrap-heap of a planet - the garbage dump of other planets in the system. HECAP learned to make new machines from the dead parts of old ones. With some friends, HE eventually escaped on a salvaged and repaired ship.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Toxic child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on an Industrial planet, NAME started working in a chemical plant at the age of six. Years of exposure to industrial toxins left HIM mentally scarred. HECAP eventually blew up the facility and escaped the planet in a stolen cargo ship.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Traders' child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up in a family of nomadic traders, making a living from selling and buying goods on many worlds. NAME learned the customs and methods of trade of many cultures by participating in HIS parents' business.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Traumatized youth
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME lived on a pleasant midworld. HISCAP prosthophobe mother fell sick with heart disease. In desperation, NAME's father abducted innocent people and harvested their hearts. NAME's father was arrested, but the child remained scarred from the experience.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Upper urbworlder
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME had a privileged childhood on a major urbworld. Living in an apartment far above the dense poverty of the city, HE spent most of HIS time reading or drawing the cityscape HE saw through HIS window.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld army brat
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up on an urbworld military base. HECAP was too young to fight, but HE learned to make HIMself useful in other ways. HECAP became familiar with guns and military equipment, but never really got in touch with the natural world.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld criminal
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into bad circumstance on an overpopulated urbworld, NAME turned to small-time crime as a way to avoid starvation and hypothermia. Robbery and murder were daily activities for HIM. NAME learned that surviving was winning.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld hooligan
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up in a dangerous urbworld. HECAP quickly learned how to get HIS daily meal - by crime. Such means left little to no space for cooking and growing activities.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urbworld urchin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born in the darkest slums of HIS urban homeworld. Neglected by HIS mother, HE learned to survive on HIS own, battling for every scrap of food HE saw. Eventually, as HIS talents exceeded HIS peers, HE ascended from the depths to the surface streets and left HIS mother behind.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown assassin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was not made as a person, but a cold hearted assassin. HECAP was bio-engineered by scientists, and trained as a killer. HECAP was bred to have no emotion, no feelings, and no care for who lives, and who dies.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown medic
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Raised to be a combat medic, NAME was trained in firearms as well as medicine. HISCAP favorite phrase when coming upon a wounded soldier was "Life or death?" Most chose life.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown slave
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was vat-grown as a slave in an illegal urbworld laboratory. As a young child, HE was taught only to cook, clean and serve HIS masters. For most of HIS childhood, HE knew nothing else.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Video gamer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was raised in a glitterworld. Everything HE wanted came to HIM. In school HE was a social butterfly. At home, HE spent HIS time looking up the newest gadgets and playing HIS favourite video games.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Video gamer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up on a midworld, mostly locked in HIS room, playing video games. HECAP was warm-hearted, with a deep fondness for animals. As HE grew up, HE turned to drugs to enhance HIS reality. During these trying times HE found passion and refuge in the gym.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Voyager child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was raised on an R&D starship, and spent most of HIS childhood travelling through the void. Approaching a mysterious planetoid, the ship was severely damaged. HIS next memory is of the ship heading out of orbit, fully repaired. HE soon developed an unnatural gift for technological research.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: VR addict
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a VR head - someone who is permanently jacked into the virtual gaming universe by HIS spinal plug. HECAP moved through HIS daily tasks barely aware of the physical reality around HIM. This left HIM nearly unable to socialize.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Wild child
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was abandoned on a toxic world overgrown with hostile plant life. HECAP became accustomed early to the cold burn of loneliness. HE learned to fight, but ate HIS food raw and uncooked.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Work camp slave
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME grew up as a slave to a particularly nasty noble family on a medieval world. While HE received no formal education, the harsh labor regimen made HIS body strong.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: World slider
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was raised by a world-hopping band of criminals. HECAP learned not to leave evidence of HIS presence in case the group had to leave in a hurry. HECAP also learned about medicine and hand-to-hand combat from HIS fellow criminals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Youth soldier
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was born into a long line of soldiers. HECAP followed that heritage, joining a military training program. HECAP excelled in all physical training programs in HIS Marine course, and even passed most of the intellectual exams. While HE was never particularly bright or nimble, NAME learned the value of hard work and suffering.
